(Program
  (Begin
    (Identifier)
    (Rescue
    { (Constant)
    ->(Identifier) }
    { (Rescue
        (Constant)
        (Constant)
        (RescuedException
          (Identifier))
        (Identifier))
    ->(Identifier) })
  {-(Else
      (Identifier))-}
  {-(Ensure
      (Identifier))-})
{-(Method
    (Identifier)
    (Rescue
      (Constant)
      (Rescue
        (Constant)
        (Constant)
        (RescuedException
          (Identifier))))
    (Else)
    (Ensure))-})
